title: Alternative to shimmer font
content:
Hi,

I really love this font for a client project but can't use it as they want to use it now for another project. Can you suggest a font similiar that would do the job similar to this. I'm after a flowing upright handwritten font ideally which will work well stacked on two lines

[http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/bluevinyl/shimmer/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131083940/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/bluevinyl/shimmer/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/bluevinyl/shimmer/")

Thanks all for your help on this!

D
author: chiefdzp

comments.content: Shinntype's [Handsome Pro](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131083940/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/shinn/handsome-pro/) is designed to be quite compact vertically.
